track.title: 1. Montreal Car Show - McGill Friends
track.annotation: See our firsttime tour to the Montreal Car Show in 2006.

track.title: 2. Lin Zhilin firsttime on KangXiLaLe
track.annotation: See asian beauty Lin Zhilin firsttime on KangXiLaiLe.

track.title: 3. My dog DaiDai firsttime on video
track.annotation: See my dog DaiDai firsttime on video (filmed by my dad).

track.title: 4. 无间道-武汉话版(funny)
track.annotation: A very funny video clip spoken in 武汉话.

track.title: 5. My wife working in KLM bussiness class
track.annotation: My firsttime experience in KLM bussiness class served by my wife.

track.title: 6. 变形金刚圣斗士版(good)
track.annotation: A very good video clip for the Transformers.
